remarks: Deriving disjunction from implication for a decidable proposition.  Based on theorem *2.54 of [WhiteheadRussell] p. 107.  The converse, ~ pm2.53 , holds whether the proposition is decidable or not.  (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 26-Mar-2018.)
statement: pm2.54dc $p |- ( DECID ph -> ( ( -. ph -> ps ) -> ( ph \/ ps ) ) ) $.
